heading: Contacts
firstPar: Marco adn Roberta will meet and greet all clients on arrival directly at La Perla. The nearest airport would be Catania-Fontanarossa located at about 40 kilometers.
secondPar: Bookings on high season will be for Saturday to Saturday only. Taxi transfers are available on request and be arranged in advance. Details on local excursions and restauratns will be available in the apartment for all our guests.
thirdPar: Cancellation policy: 60 days prior arrival free of charge.
